document.full_text: a u.n.-appointed panel has found "credible allegations" that tens of thousands of civilians were killed and war crimes were committed in the final months of sri lanka's war with the liberation tigers of tamil eelam, and urged the investigation and prosecution of those responsible.
document.title: u.n. panel says war crimes likely committed in sri lanka war
lines_and_colors: a u.n.-appointed panel has found "credible allegations" that tens of thousands of civilians were killed and war crimes were committed in the final months of sri lanka's war with the liberation tigers of tamil eelam, and urged the investigation and prosecution of those responsible.
